param.name: emailProtection
param.label: Enable Email Cloaking
param.description: The e-mail address anti-spam protection option. The protection will be applied when creating or modifying e-mail links through the editor interface. When enabled the e-mail address is obfuscated into a special string that has no meaning for humans or spam bots, but which is properly rendered and accepted by the browser.
